name: Simul Archfiends
effectText: This turn, neither player can Special Summon monsters with the same card types (Ritual, Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link) they already control. If you do not control 2 or more of the same card types (Ritual, Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link), all Ritual, Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, and Link Monsters you currently control gain 500 ATK. You can only activate 1 "Simul Archfiends" per turn.
